tripleplay.ui

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • tripleplay.ui.Element<T>
      • tripleplay.ui.Widget<T>
        • tripleplay.ui.TextWidget<Field>
          • tripleplay.ui.Field

  • public class Field
extends TextWidget<Field>
    Displays text which can be edited via the Keyboard.getText(playn.core.Keyboard.TextType, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, playn.core.util.Callback<java.lang.String>) popup.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Style.Flag AUTOCAPITALIZATION
      Controls the behavior of native text fields with respect to auto-capitalization on platforms that support it.
      static Style.Flag AUTOCORRECTION
      Controls the behavior of native text fields with respect to auto-correction on platforms that support it.
      static Style.Flag FULLTIME_NATIVE_FIELD
      If on a platform that utilizes native fields and this is true, the native field is displayed whenever this Field is visible, and the native field is responsible for all text rendering.
      static Style<Integer> MAXIMUM_INPUT_LENGTH
      Sets the maximum number of characters that can be entered by this Field.
      static Style.Flag MULTILINE
      Sets the field to allow the return key to insert a line break in the text.
      static Style<String> RETURN_KEY_LABEL
      Sets the label used on the "return" key of the virtual keyboard on native keyboards.
      static Style.Flag SECURE_TEXT_ENTRY
      Controls secure text entry on native text fields: typically this will mean dots or asterix displayed instead of the typed character.
      react.Value<String> text
      The text displayed by this widget.
      static Style<Keyboard.TextType> TEXT_TYPE
      Sets the Keyboard.TextType in use by this Field.

    • Field Detail

      • FULLTIME_NATIVE_FIELD

        public static final Style.Flag FULLTIME_NATIVE_FIELD
        If on a platform that utilizes native fields and this is true, the native field is displayed whenever this Field is visible, and the native field is responsible for all text rendering. If false, the native field is only displayed while actively editing (after a user click).

      • AUTOCAPITALIZATION

        public static final Style.Flag AUTOCAPITALIZATION
        Controls the behavior of native text fields with respect to auto-capitalization on platforms that support it.

      • AUTOCORRECTION

        public static final Style.Flag AUTOCORRECTION
        Controls the behavior of native text fields with respect to auto-correction on platforms that support it.

      • SECURE_TEXT_ENTRY

        public static final Style.Flag SECURE_TEXT_ENTRY
        Controls secure text entry on native text fields: typically this will mean dots or asterix displayed instead of the typed character.

      • TEXT_TYPE

        public static final Style<Keyboard.TextType> TEXT_TYPE
        Sets the Keyboard.TextType in use by this Field.

      • MAXIMUM_INPUT_LENGTH

        public static final Style<Integer> MAXIMUM_INPUT_LENGTH
        Sets the maximum number of characters that can be entered by this Field. Currently only supported by Native fields. Anything less than 1 indicates unlimited (or limited by the platform only).

      • RETURN_KEY_LABEL

        public static final Style<String> RETURN_KEY_LABEL
        Sets the label used on the "return" key of the virtual keyboard on native keyboards. Be aware that some platforms (such as iOS) have a limited number of options. The underlying native implementation is responsible for attempting to match this style, but may be unable to do so. Defaults to null (uses platform default).

      • MULTILINE

        public static final Style.Flag MULTILINE
        Sets the field to allow the return key to insert a line break in the text.

      • text

        public final react.Value<String> text
        The text displayed by this widget.

      • Field

     Styles styles)

    • Method Detail

      • finishedEditing

        public react.SignalView<Boolean> finishedEditing()
        Returns a signal that is dispatched when text editing is complete.

      • setTextType

        @Deprecated
public Field setTextType(Keyboard.TextType type)
        Deprecated. Use the TEXT_TYPE Style instead.
        Configures the keyboard type to use when text is requested via a popup.

      • setPopupLabel

        public Field setPopupLabel(String label)
        Configures the label to be displayed when text is requested via a popup.

      • setValidator

        public Field setValidator(NativeTextField.Validator validator)
        Set the text field validator for use with this field. The default is to go through textIsValid(String). Pass in null to set/restore the default validator. Note that setting a custom validator will bypass checking of the MAXIMUM_INPUT_LENGTH style.
        Returns:
        this for call chaining.

      • setTransformer

        public Field setTransformer(NativeTextField.Transformer transformer)
        Set the text field transformer for use with this field. The default is to go through transformText(String). Pass in null to set/restore the default transformer.
        Returns:
        this for call chaining.

      • updateNativeFieldBounds

        public Field updateNativeFieldBounds()
        Forcibly notify the NativeTextField backing this field that its screen position has changed.
        Returns:
        this for call chaining.

      • hasFocus

        public boolean hasFocus()
        Returns true if this Field is backed by a native field and that field currently has keyboard (virtual or physical) focus.
